a.n: A Wifes Affair 1 Abigail Mac & Vanessa Veracruz

p.k: After years of being married to Manolo, Abigail Mac has become a bored and lonely house wife. With no meaningful conversation and no spark to make her feel
p.d: After years of being married to Manolo, Abigail Mac has become a bored and lonely house wife. With no meaningful conversation and no spark to make her feel truly desired, she has taken matters into her own hands and taken on new relationships ... with women. Times have also been rough for house wife Vanessa Veracruz too. Her husband works late nights and never opens himself up to be the vulnerable lover she desperately needs. When Abigail and Vanessa first became friends, they immediately felt that spark between them, but their husbands were holding them back.
